history.text: This sounds like a great movie!
Frozen is such a great movie! Kristen Bell is the perfect actress to play the voice of Anna! Disney made this movie for all ages which is great!
Yes, it's something I can feel good about watching with my kids.
I agree! Not only is it acceptable for all ages, but it's even entertaining for us adults! How about the amazing responses from the critics!?
That is quite different, to have all the critics like it.
Yes, it seems like critics who care about the quality of the film as well as critics who are looking at the big picture of showing this to the masses all agree! Very cool!
I love being able to watch something entertaining and uplifting as well.
Family entertainment is perfect for that! This has one of the highest Rotten Tomatoes scores I've ever seen with 89%! Did you notice how high the ratings are?
Yes, but I'm not too familiar with Rotten Tomatoes or Metacritics, so I wasn't sure how that compared to other movies they have rated.
I am familiar with Rotten Tomatoes and they are a very reputable company/website! Plus to see an A+ from Cinemascore is very cool too!
Yes, I was impressed with that A+.
I see that one of the key scenes is when Princess Elsa possesses her magic! Sounds very cool.
I wonder what cryokinetic magic is?
I was wondering the same thing! It seems like you may need to be from Arendelle!
Yes, for sure.
Do you believe it was said to be the best animated musical to come out since The Little Mermaid and Beauty and the Beast?
It's great to know that excellent movies are still possible!
Did you know this was inspired by the fairy tale "The Snow Queen"?
Yes, it did state that in the information.  I am not sure if I remember that story.
I have never heard of that specific story but I have heard of Hans Christian Andersen who wrote The Little Mermaid!
Yes and I know most of his stories, so I probably have heard it.
Amazing writer! Have you heard of the other two main voice actors in this film? Idina Menzel and Jonathan Groff?
I have heard of Idina Menzel, though I can't picture her right now.
I see. It looks like there are some conflicts that occur with Elsa, Anna and Kristoff at the ice palace.
Conflict always makes a good story.
Agreed. The antagonist seems to be Kristoff. Leaving Anna in a room to die!
I think Prince Hans is actually the antagonist.
You are correct! I read that wrong, thank you for clarification!
No problem.
